Description:
Are you a female housekeeper with a passion for hospitality? Apt Resources is seeking a Female Personal Housekeeper for our client a Royal Family in Abu Dhabi.. As the ideal candidate, you will provide exceptional service to our distinguished clients in their luxurious homes. You will be responsible for maintaining the cleanliness and tidiness of their residence in accordance with their preferences and requests. Your attention to detail and willingness to go above and beyond will make you a valuable addition to their team.Clean and tidy all areas of the residence including bedrooms, bathrooms, living areas, and kitchen
Dust and polish furniture and fixtures
Launder and change bed linens and towels
Stock household items and maintain inventory
Assist with meal preparation and general household tasks as needed
Handle delicate items and antiques with care
Communicate with the family to ensure their satisfaction and address any concernsJob Details
